alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 01 at 7:13PM MST until March 01 at 7:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 745 PM MST. * At 712 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Chandler Fashion Center Mall, or over Chandler, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mesa, Chandler, Gilbert, Tempe, Sun Lakes, Tempe Marketplace, Arizona Mills Mall, Gilbert City Hall, Tumbleweed Park, Chandler City Hall, San Tan Village Mall, Arizona State University, Fiesta Mall, Chandler Fashion Center Mall and Mesa Riverview Mall. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 154 and 169. US Highway 60 between mile markers 173 and 180. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 161 and 173. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
